channel.title: Click this link expert programmers
channel.description: Hey guys, what's up? I'm andrew I'm 13 and I just started learning Java. I have a pretty good hang of R.S.P.S programming, but nothing to do with blank sources. I was searching google and mopar for blank sources untill I came upon one called utopia. Just downloaded it and I have some sort of feeling, like i'm supposed to to this... I want to try and program/code a blank 317 R.S.P.S from scratch. Would anyone be willing to help me develop this little "Project" I want to do? I know I may be 13 but don't let that intimidate you, I act like an adult and can co operate well... If you would like to help, just contact me via my skype - Minnesnowta.ftw Thanks for reading this...

item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If you wish to start up a development team, then look at this topic and then create a topic in that section.

Read full topic

item.title: Click this link expert programmers
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

I would love to assist you sometimes through Skype, if you really need urgent help.

Read full topic

item.title: Click this link expert programmers
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

TehEpicMN:

I don’t really use the word “team” that much, but I guess that works. My vision of it was like Tiers of a team, Main programmer, CO, then different sections relating to different things like let’s say there is a Shop team, they would work on updating and making the shops neat and organized for players. Then so on and so forth if you get what I mean.

If that’s the team you had in mind I can tell you you’re going to need SO many different people… xD
I suggest you learn Java itself aside from RSPS Development; you’ll see that the majority of the modules of an RS2Server can be written by yourself and when you do need a team it won’t be more than 4 to 5 people.

Read full topic

item.title: Click this link expert programmers
item.dc:creator: @TehEpicMN TehEpicMN
item.description:
@TehEpicMN wrote:

Hey guys, what’s up? I’m andrew I’m 13 and I just started learning Java. I have a pretty good hang of R.S.P.S programming, but nothing to do with blank sources. I was searching google and mopar for blank sources untill I came upon one called utopia. Just downloaded it and I have some sort of feeling, like i’m supposed to to this… I want to try and program/code a blank 317 R.S.P.S from scratch. Would anyone be willing to help me develop this little “Project” I want to do? I know I may be 13 but don’t let that intimidate you, I act like an adult and can co operate well… If you would like to help, just contact me via my skype - Minnesnowta.ftw Thanks for reading this…

Read full topic
